entry.title: Debugging Custom Report Item controls for Sql Server Reporting Services
entry.summary: When you are developing a control which inherits from CustomReportItem for Sql Server Reporting Services (SSRS) you will certainly want to debug your code. The documentation is shoddy and at best incomplete, and the examples are poorly explained. So being

entry.title: PRB: 'That assembly does not allow partially trusted callers.' When installing a CRI on a dedicated SSRS server
